CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), 0, CASE( TEXT(Status), "New", ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 24 * 60, 0), "Completed", ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 24 * 60, 0), "Escalated", ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 24 * 60, 0), "In Progress", ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 24 * 60, 0), 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Case Ageee
